about.details:
Incorporated in 2000, Mumbai based Innovative Ideals and Services (India) Limited is a company engaged in the business of providing services of System Integration for security, safety and building automation and installation of various electronics systems.

The company provides a wide range of services in security and electronic systems, like Home Automation Systems, Access Controls, Video Door Phone, Audio Door Phone, CCTV Systems, Intrusion Alarm System, Fire Alarm Systems and Telecom Products. The company caters to the residential construction industry in a B2B segment.

Innovative provides Video Door Phones under its own brand names, "Onyx" and "Inok" and Home automation solutions under the brand name of "eHomes".

The Company introduced Fibre to the Home (FTTH) solutions that allow multiple Internet Service Providers (ISPs) to use a single fiber cable to provide their services.

As part of his expansion, the Company has developed 2 innovative products, "Savior" and "ArmHer", in the B2C segments. The products address the safety needs of children, women and senior citizens. It has also launched basic feature mobile phones "Inoyo".

Innovative is an authorized distributor of FERMAX Electronica S.A.U. for their products FERMAX Audio/Video Door Entry System. The company has also entered into an agreement with Tata Sky Broadband Private Limited for the provision of broadband services from March 15, 2018, to March 14, 2023.

The company has 2 warehouse facilities in Mumbai.

Between 2014-15 to 2017-18-

- Total revenue grew from 1245.07 to 2031.84.
- EBITDA grew from 103.70 to 487.70.
- PAT grew from 15.56 to 308.79

Innovative has 67 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Innovative Ideals IPO?
faqs.answer:
Innovative Ideals IPO is a SME IPO of 3066000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹12.26 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 24, 2018, and closes on September 26, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Innovative Ideals IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Innovative Ideals IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Innovative Ideals IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Innovative Ideals IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Innovative Ideals IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Innovative Ideals IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Innovative Ideals IPO opens on September 24, 2018 and closes on September 26, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Innovative Ideals IPO?
faqs.answer: Innovative Ideals IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Innovative Ideals IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Innovative Ideals IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Innovative Ideals IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Innovative Ideals IPO will be done on Monday, October 1, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, October 4, 2018. Check the Innovative Ideals IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Innovative Ideals IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Innovative Ideals IPO listing date is on Friday, October 5, 2018.
